title: Support diversity with the Rainbow Fluft Icon

replies.body: Great Riot started to become a virtue signaling game. Riot if you gonna turn this game into a politics shit hole you will drive away hardcore fans like me. I swear if Riots keeps walking down the path of trying to change people's political views through shit like this, it is gonna drive the hardcore fans away who play this game to avoid this shit in real life. Riot do not become a political game machine because if you do, this game will die just like "Bully Hunters" who virtue signaled and that product was a complete and utter failure. If this happens then goodbye my league experience. DO NOT BECOME POLITICAL VIRTUE SIGNALING MACHINES LIKE YOUTUBE. I'm tired of whatever politics this is shoved down my throat all over social media, news and real life. if this type of "thing" continues into gameplay of league of legends I'm just straight up quitting league. An example would be "Killing minions is too cruel so we are going to that mechanic so people pat minions on the head to get gold and you can't kill the enemy anymore because it is too violent".

Hey man, you are having a pretty spectacular reaction to what is, in all honesty, a tiny, optional, cosmetic celebration of diversity. If you read the comments section there are people complaining about how minor a stance that riot is taking. Let's look at what riot is actually doing here, they are raising awareness for a day of inclusivity. Nobody is mentioning politics or shoving anything down anybody's throat. If you can't handle even the idea of people different from yourself being celebrated maybe it is time for you to find a new hobby? I'm sure riot won't mind losing you, there are plenty of old-school players who welcome riots efforts to make their game less of a toxic wasteland of homophobic, transphobic and biphobic garbage. {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}

Damn son, you were attempting to take the high ground there for a moment, then you degenerated into labeling people with a different opinion to yourself as "trash". 

The vast majority of people out there are accepting of alternative lifestyles, but who still acknowledge/enjoy P in V as the normal and evolutionary imperative. If you're struggling that much to accept this, maybe a glance in the mirror would help. I'd suggest a good, long, hard look at yourself, but I'm not sure if your bathroom mirror is a "safespace".

Keep an escapist videogame politics/ideology free.

Lmao always amazing to see idiots thinking that tolerance is somehow a political issue, and it's pretty easy to assume that someone who's happy to demean people based on a homophobic view is more or less trash :^)

Riot isn't forcing anyone to celebrate this, so I don't know why you'd run your mouth about something you don't have to take part in.

I really dunno how to tell people this, but, people are still gonna be crappy even on this day.

Not sorry to ruin the moment. So why is it even a thing?

"Just because the world isn't fair, doesn't mean we should stop trying to make it so"
- someone at some point

"Stay positive!" - Lux ^-^. Maybe it will spark a discussion like right now. Take the time to reflect on your values, why you have them and if you believe they are logically correct or perhaps its something that has just been drilled into your brain. Whenever you find yourself in disagreement with others I think its important to analyse flaws in your statements as well as others' statements :D

Weird. I've seen quite a few days just like this. On the same day, with the same premise, just slightly different. For example, [IDAHOBIT](https://www.idahobit.org.au/) is the International Day Against Homophobia, Biphobia, Intersexism, and Transphobia. Kinda weird that IDAHOTB and IDAHOBIT are nearly the same. Almost like they've been re-branded.
